text: And to the people of Thamûd We sent their brother Ṣâliḥ. He said, “O my people! Worship God—you have no other god except Him. A clear proof has come to you from your Lord: this is God’s she-camel as a sign to you. So leave her to graze ˹freely˺ on God’s land and do not harm her, or else you will be overcome by a painful punishment
